title: OSAPI: Status field for image does not match image_state metadata value

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dwalleck

comments.content: The metadata value is an implementation detail of Nova. Ideally, it would not exist or be hidden from the end-user. You should ignore it.
